name: Patricia Hutapea
description: Born in Jakarta. Based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Serving as a Shareholder of PT Artha Permata Makmur since December 31, 2019. And became a director since February 18, 2020.
career: Started her career as an Assistant Product Manager at Citibank (1998). Then became an Assistant Product Manager at Gardenia Foods Singapore (1998-2000). After that, she worked as a Financial Marketing Summer Intern at Pepsi Cola Company, New York (2001). Then served as a Business Manager at Nissho Iwai American Corporation, New York (2002-2004). Shareholder of PT Panca Global Sekuritas since 2004 and PT Panca Global Kapital since 2018.
background: Studied Business Administration at the University of Wisconsin, Madison, and earned a Master of Business Administration degree from Carnegie Mellon University, Pittsburgh PA.

name: Lili Darmawan
description: Born in Jakarta. Based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Serving as a Shareholder of PT Artha Permata Makmur since January 2018.
career: Worked at PT Altha Permata Makmur Indonesia as Director of Accounting and Finance since 2004.
background: Completed her education in Economics at the School of Economics YAI Jakarta in 2001.
